Name: Malty Dry Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist or Fragata Green Olive .
Express lemon zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish &/or adorn with skewered olive.
Review: Using a genuinely malty oude genever produces a deliciously retro take on the modern Dry Martini.
History: A Martini that emerged in 2008 and I've caressed with the addition of Abbot's bitters. See: Dry Martini history
Nutrition: One serving of Malty Dry Martini contains 114 calories
